Html:
We would like to use gmap witn NI 2013, is there anything for documentation you can recommend or how to even start? We have a lot of broken subvi's and can not find how to run even a demo of the code or what is supposed to do.

Any help to get off the ground would be welcome and appreciated

Thanks

Robert
open solution, set startup project Demo.*, F5, done

Thank you for replying.

I don't mean to be slow to understand, but I am not sure how to use the project.

The demo does come up and will show the map it comes with, but when I click "set Start" or "set End" nothing is prompted and I can't seem to change these points.
  1. I don't see how the NI vi's work with the demo.exe; do we treat the demo.exe as an active X object and supply parameters through the interface to set the co-ordinates or do I build the Google Earth LV8 into and exe that is equivalent to the Demo.exe?
  2. I am using Win 7 with NI and want to use your system on a Labview screen to show a track that was driven, I have the lvproj and tried to build it but I get a lot of broken vi's; do you have any idea's on how to fix these?
  3. There are a number of dll's under dynamic maps, are these not relevant for replaying a historical map?
  4. There is also a "V8 navigate to place". Should I disregards this as well?
  5. Is there somewhere you can point me to for the format that the VI's expect the gps data to be in so it can read the historical data in the format you have specified?
Thanks

Robert
the source is available, demo is for demo, you build your own app

Hi

Ok, I understand…

Do you do consulting…? We would use your code and add a few minor points like where events occurred on the route. If so do you have a rate or do you do a fixed bid?

Thanks

Robert
